org.turbogwt.mvp.databind.client

Interface BindingView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Binder, BindingValidationHandler, HasBindingHandler, HasBindingValues, WidgetBinder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BindingViewImpl

    public interface BindingView
extends HasBindingHandler, HasBindingValues, WidgetBinder, BindingValidationHandler
    Interface that must be implemented by the View to support databind.

    Usually you will delegate all possible executions to ViewEngine.

    Author:
    Danilo Reinert
